title: Stocks to Watch: HUL, Eveready, L&T Finance, Banks, Autos, Adani Group - Business Standard
content: Stocks to Watch: HUL, Eveready, L&T Finance, Banks, Autos, Adani Group  Business Standard
description: Auto stocks are likely to react to the monthly sales reported over the last two days. Tata Motors and M&M sales reported strong sales.
